Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.splash

Class FadeInTimer

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.Timer
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.splash.FadeInTimer
public class FadeInTimer extends Timer
A Timer that is to be used for creating the fade-in effect of the SplashScene.
